arts.sum: Hansi Flick was visibly pleased after Barcelona’s win over Valencia at the weekend, a nd rightfully so given that his side dominated the game from start to finish and won by a six-goal margin. arts.ttl: Christensen admits Barcelona will miss key superstar vs Newcastle – ‘Made for these games’
arts.sum: Barcelona are set to kickstart their Champions League campaign on Thursday as they take on Newcastle United at St James’ Park.
